org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowMapController

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowMapController

@Implements(value=com.google.android.maps.MapController.class)
public class ShadowMapController
extends Object

A Shadow of MapController that tracks its own state and keeps the state of the MapView it controlls up to date.
